name: cafe-face-presence-system
description: Система учёта присутствия сотрудников по лицу

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd ../recognition && python -m venv venv && . venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.install:recognition: cd recognition && python -m venv venv && . venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --names "BACKEND,FRONTEND,RECOGNITION" --prefix-colors "bgBlue.bold,bgMagenta.bold,bgGreen.bold" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:recognition"
